main.name: Deepank Khurana
main.description: I am not your average software engineer.I am passionate about building excellent software that improves the lives of those around me. I specialize in creating software for clients ranging from individuals and small-businesses all the way to large enterprise corporations. I am an excellent web developeer. I have experience in Data Science as well.
main.bio: I am currently a R&D intern at Dassault Systemes. I am pursuing Masters in Information system. I am very interested in Web and Software Development. I was a TA for Web design/User experience course at Northeastern before starting my Internship
main.contactmessage: Want to get in touch. Shoot a message

resume.skillmessage: Proficient in Java, Python, ReactJs, Javascript, Angular, Jquery, Bootstrap

education.description: Learned ton of things during undergraduation. Help me acheive what I am today.

work.title: R&D Intern

work.title: Team Lead
work.description: Spearheaded a team of 8 engineers responsible for design of test automation architecture. Involved with the development team in estimating, planning and refactoring software development programs, projects and related tasks. Created and maintained all the technical documentation, project architecture and blueprint

work.title: Application Development Analyst
work.description: Mined data for successful execution of end to end test scenarios in SAP ECC and provide resolution for user tickets on SAP MM areas involving invoice verification, Material planning, Purchase requisition, Purchase order, Source list, Contracting etc, also worked on SAP SD and OTM. Automated and tested over 300 scripts in SAP TAO and over 50 scripts in HP QTP. Performed Data Manipulation and data cleaning operation using SQL for business needs

projects.title: Snake and Ping pong using python

testimonials.text: Mr. Khurana is one of the most motivated, forward-thinking and intelligent student that I have. He is extremely responsible and an excellent Teaching Assistant.
testimonials.user: Vishal Chawla, Asst Professor - Northeastern University

testimonials.text: Deepank is a talented and wonderful student with great problem solving skills. Deepank pays excellent attentions to details and has good understanding of algorithms.His ability to distinguish and apply right machine learning algorithm makes him stand out among his peers.
